alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 6:43PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Areas of Dense Fog Overnight... Areas of fog, some locally dense, will continue to develop across portions of the southern Adirondacks, Mohawk Valley, the Lake George Saratoga region, and across Windham County in southeast Vermont overnight. Some visibilities may drop to near or under one quarter of a mile in these areas. Motorists should anticipate significant reductions in visibility in these areas overnight, and should use low beam headlights and take it slow when encountering fog overnight. The areas of dense fog will impact portions of the New York State Thruway, Interstate 90 and Interstate 87, including along the Adirondack Northway, as well as Interstate 91 in southeast Vermont.
